description: This file defines the main React component for a Notes application, including internal hooks and UI logic. It manages note state, provides functionalities for adding, deleting, editing, and viewing notes, and composes other components like Sidebar, NoteEditor, and NoteViewer.

methods.name: useNotes
methods.description: Custom React hook that manages the notes data and editing state, providing functions to add, delete, select, and update notes.

methods.name: NotesApp
methods.description: Main React component for the Notes application, rendering the UI and utilizing the useNotes hook to manage state.
